tool_description: Changes the capitalization of input text based on language style rules - supports over 20 languages including English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Swedish, Indonesian and more.
name: Capitalizer
title: Capitalizer

api_list.name: Capitalizer
api_list.description: Changes the capitalization of incoming text based on language rules of that text and responds with a simple string

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The ISO 639-1 code if know or "autoDetect" to detect language before applying the change.

required_parameters.name: mode
required_parameters.description: The target capitalization mode: default, title, sentence, lower, upper, nospace
